label: cascading_failure_01_dx_dns_migration_003
content:
## 2026-01-05 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /zone-transfer: REQUESTS req | p50: 705ms p95: 1680ms p99: N/A | err: 3.4% (2 errors) | success: 96.6%
- /dns-query: REQUESTS req | p50: N/A p95: N/A p99: N/A | err: 0.12% (N/A errors) | success: 99.88%
- /dnssec-sign: REQUESTS req | p50: N/A p95: N/A p99: N/A | err: N/A | success: N/A
- /health-check: REQUESTS req | p50: N/A p95: N/A p99: N/A | err: N/A | success: N/A
- /change-request: REQUESTS req | p50: N/A p95: N/A p99: N/A | err: N/A | success: N/A

### Infrastructure
- bind-master-01: CPU 46% | Mem 66% | Disk 72% | Conns: N/A | Net: 110/145 Mbps
- bind-slave-02: CPU 34% | Mem 57% | Disk 55% | Conns: N/A | Net: 92/101 Mbps
- cloud-dns-sync-01: CPU 71% | Mem 77% | Disk 47% | Conns: N/A | Net: 140/170 Mbps
- signer-01: CPU 58% | Mem 81% | Disk 59% | Conns: N/A | Net: 22/26 Mbps

### Connection Pools
- pool-axfr: active N/A | idle N/A | waiting N/A | exhaustion: N/A | max: N/A | avg_wait: N/A
- pool-ixfr: active N/A | idle N/A | waiting N/A | exhaustion: N/A | max: N/A | avg_wait: N/A
- pool-dns-queries: active N/A | idle N/A | waiting N/A | exhaustion: N/A | max: N/A | avg_wait: N/A
- pool-signing: active N/A | idle N/A | waiting N/A | exhaustion: N/A | max: N/A | avg_wait: N/A

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 86.2% | Bandwidth: 1.2 Gbps | Origin requests: 45,000

### Alerts
- [SEVERE] TSIG authentication failure on bind-slave-02: key mismatch
- [WARNING] DNSSEC DS mismatch detected for zone example.com
- [INFO] 16 zones imported into cloud-managed DNS
- [ERROR] 11 zonefile lint errors found post-import
- [CRITICAL] 2 TTL change rollbacks executed
- [NOTICE] Stakeholders reported stale answers; TTL restored to 900s

### Deployments & Changes
- Imported 16 new zones into cloud-managed DNS; post-import lint found 11 issues (mostly missing trailing dots, SPF TXT quoting)
- Corrected TSIG key name mismatch on bind-slave-02 after authentication failures; retried AXFR
- Paused DNSSEC publish for zone example.org after DS mismatch; coordinated registrar resync
- Restored TTL from 120s to 900s for critical A records after stakeholder reports of stale answers

### Events
- Imported 16 new zones; lint issues identified
- TSIG authentication failures started post key rotation; corrected key mismatch
- DS mismatch detected after registrar update lag; paused DNSSEC publish and coordinated resync
- Two TTL change rollbacks executed; TTL restored to 900s for critical records

### On-Call
- shift handoff: S. Ahmed. 4 pages. 9 tickets. Status: Degraded during import window; stabilized after TSIG fix and DNSSEC hold on one zone
